law.catch_line: Contests involving horses may be basis for a lottery.
law.text: The corporation may utilize horse racing or contests involving horses for any purpose including, but not limited to, advertising, promoting, conducting a lottery, or as a basis for a lottery, after obtaining the necessary permission from the horse racing track or sponsoring authority involved.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 76, effective July 1, 1990.
